title: 'Cos it's naughty (TEFC)

description: Episode number 3 of Series "Children Thinking". Interaction between parent and child in the child's growing understanding of right and wrong. How does the child know what a lie is? How can the child begin understanding the framework of good and naughty imposed on them by adults?
